title: Design Led
description: Zippers and Metal Trims are essential design elements which provide details to fashion. Our in-house design team works with leading apparel brands to develop and deliver products which appeal to end-customers.

title: Global Speed Delivery Model
description: Tex is a pioneer in super fast deliveries which are achieved through a unique distributed manufacturing model, similar to a hub-and-spoke system.
